title: Cinnamon Sugar Croissants
directions: Preheat oven according to Pillsbury package directions.
Unroll the crescent dough and separate into triangles.
Brush each triangle with melted butter or neutral oil.
Mix cinnamon and sugar together, then sprinkle over the buttered dough.
Roll up the crescents per package instructions and place on a baking sheet.
Bake as directed on the package until golden brown.
Optionally drizzle with honey after baking.
notes: A quick, cozy breakfast upgrade for pre-made croissant dough. Other sweet variations: add a small spoon of jam before rolling (any flavor works), brush with honey and sprinkle flaky sea salt after baking, or smear a mix of brown sugar and butter inside before rolling for a caramel ribbon effect.
